meanings.definition: The quality or state of being red.
meanings.sent1: The rednesses of the sunset painted the sky beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Her cheeks showed a hint of rednesses after running in the cold.
meanings.sent3: The clown's exaggerated rednesses on his face made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The rednesses of anger in his eyes were impossible to miss.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant rednesses of the roses brightened up the garden.

meanings.sent1: The room was filled with various rednesses from the decorations.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully mixed different rednesses to create the perfect shade.
meanings.sent3: The rednesses of the painting seemed to jump out at the viewer.
meanings.sent4: The rednesses of the flag symbolized courage and strength.
meanings.sent5: The bright rednesses of the apples stood out in the fruit bowl.

meanings.sent1: The sudden rednesses of her face revealed her embarrassment.
meanings.sent2: His skin showed rednesses as a reaction to the sunburn.
meanings.sent3: The rednesses of the thermometer indicated a fever.
meanings.sent4: The rednesses of the traffic light signaled us to stop.
meanings.sent5: The rednesses of the ripe strawberries made them look delicious.
